Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

package de.tum.cit.fop.maze
  • Class
    Description
    AchievementHud
    Handles the visual popup for achievements.
    AchievementManager
    Manages game achievements, persistence (saving), and the unlock queue.
    AchievementManager.AchievementEntry
    Inner class representing a single achievement entry from the JSON file.
    AchievementScreen
    Screen that displays all achievements in a polished list of boxes.
    AI
    Pathfinding logic for enemies using the A* algorithm.
    BigEnemy
    The BigEnemy class represents the third enemy type in the game.
    ChickenJockey
    The ChickenJockey class represents a fast, flying enemy using bat visuals.
    CollectableLives
    Represents a heart item on the ground that gives the player extra lives.
    CollectablePowerUps
    Represents a power-up item that gives the player temporary abilities.
    CollectablePowerUps.Type
    Enum defining the different types of power-ups available in the game.
    DesktopLauncher
    The DesktopLauncher class is the entry point for the desktop version of the Maze Runner game.
    DevConsole
    Developer console for entering cheat commands during gameplay.
    Enemy
     
    Enemy.State
     
    GameObject
    Base class for all visible game objects that have a position, size, texture, and collision box.
    GameOverScreen
    Screen displayed when the player runs out of lives and fails to complete the level.
    GamePreferences
    Manages the persistent game settings such as music volume and key bindings.
    GamePreferences.InputSettings
     
    GameScreen
    The main gameplay screen where all the action happens.
    GameStateManager
    Manages saving and loading game state to disk using JSON files.
    GameStateManager.EnemyData
    Stores information about a single enemy in the level.
    GameStateManager.ItemData
    Stores information about a collectible item on the ground.
    GameStateManager.SaveState
    Represents a complete snapshot of the game state at a moment in time.
    GameStateManager.TrapData
    Stores information about a single trap in the level.
    Hud
    Heads-Up Display (HUD) that shows game information overlaid on top of the gameplay screen.
    ImmortalSnail
    The Immortal Snail is a special enemy that adds a fun challenge to the game.
    Item
    Base class for all collectible and interactable items in the game.
    LeaderboardManager
    Manages the game's high score leaderboard for endless mode.
    LeaderboardManager.ScoreEntry
    Represents a single entry on the leaderboard.
    LeaderboardScreen
    Screen that displays the top 10 high scores from endless mode.
    MageBolt
    Represents a magic fireball projectile fired by mage enemies.
    MageEnemy
    A stationary ranged enemy that fires magic bolts at the player.
    MapManager
    Central manager for all map-related functionality in the game.
    MasteryManager
    Manages the permanent progression system (skill tree) that persists across game sessions.
    MasteryManager.MasteryData
    Container class for all mastery data that gets saved to disk.
    MasteryScreen
    Screen that displays the skill tree where players can spend skill points on permanent upgrades.
    MazeMap
    Generates random mazes for endless mode using a modified Prim's algorithm.
    MazeRunnerGame
    Main game class that serves as the central hub for Maze Runner.
    MenuScreen
    The main menu screen of the game displayed after the intro animation.
    NormalEnemy
    Represents a standard skeleton enemy in the game.
    Obstacle
    Abstract base class for all interactive obstacles in the game.
    OptionsMenu
    The options/settings menu screen accessible from the main menu or pause menu.
    Player
    The main character controlled by the user.
    SaveSelectionScreen
    Save slot selection screen for story mode.
    ScoreManager
    Manages the scoring system for both story and endless modes.
    ScoreToast
    A temporary floating text notification that appears when points are gained or lost.
    StoryLevelLoader
    Loads story mode levels from external .properties files.
    StoryLevelLoader.LevelData
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) that transports level information from file to game engine.
    StoryScreen
     
    Traps
    Represents static floor hazards that damage or debuff the player on contact.
    VictoryScreen
    Victory screen shown when the player successfully completes a level.
    VoiceManager
    The class VoiceManager acts as an audio manager for all vocal sound effects in the game.
    VoiceManager.Category
    Sound categories for volume control and organization.
    Weapons
    Represents a weapon upgrade collectible that permanently increases player damage.
